items.name: Hiking the Cape Cod National Seashore trails
items.description: Explore the beautiful hiking trails of Cape Cod National Seashore.

items.name: Biking the Cape Cod Rail Trail
items.description: Enjoy a scenic bike ride along the Cape Cod Rail Trail.

items.name: Kayaking in Pleasant Bay
items.description: Experience the serene waters of Pleasant Bay on a kayaking adventure.

items.name: Golfing at Ocean Edge Resort
items.description: Play a round of golf at the stunning Ocean Edge Resort.

items.name: Relaxing at Coast Guard Beach
items.description: Spend a relaxing day at Coast Guard Beach in Eastham.

items.name: Surfing at Nauset Beach
items.description: Catch some waves at Nauset Beach in Orleans.

items.name: Sunbathing at Craigville Beach
items.description: Soak up the sun at the beautiful Craigville Beach in Centerville.

items.name: Collecting shells at Mayflower Beach
items.description: Discover a variety of shells at Mayflower Beach in Dennis.

items.name: Visiting the Pilgrim Monument
items.description: Explore the historic Pilgrim Monument in Provincetown.

items.name: Attending a show at the Cape Playhouse
items.description: Enjoy a live performance at the renowned Cape Playhouse in Dennis.

items.name: Exploring the Cape Cod Museum of Art
items.description: Discover the works of local artists at the Cape Cod Museum of Art.

items.name: Taking a tour of the Edward Gorey House
items.description: Step into the quirky world of Edward Gorey at his former residence in Yarmouth Port.

items.name: Indulging in a lobster roll at Sesuit Harbor Cafe
items.description: Savor a delicious lobster roll at the iconic Sesuit Harbor Cafe in Dennis.

items.name: Sampling local brews at Cape Cod Beer
items.description: Taste a variety of locally crafted beers at Cape Cod Beer in Hyannis.

items.name: Enjoying fresh oysters at Raw Bar
items.description: Indulge in freshly shucked oysters at the Raw Bar in Mashpee.

items.name: Treating yourself to homemade ice cream at Four Seas
items.description: Delight in the creamy, homemade flavors at Four Seas Ice Cream in Centerville.
